text: Bumetopia quadripunctata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Heller in 1923. It is known from the Philippines.BioLib.cz - Bumetopia quadripunctata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Homonoeini Category:Beetles described in 1923
title: Bumetopia quadripunctata
